name: Atompark Software Bulk SMS Sender API
tagline: API for sendind sms via Atompark SMS Service
body:
### Atomic Bulk SMS Service API
This PHP API allows to send sms via [Atomic Bulk SMS Sender](http://www.massmailsoftware.com/bulksmsandpager/)

To activate API 3.0. usage, please login into Atomic SMS Sender account and in the Settings section -> Atomic SMS Sender tab choose “Yes” in the Active API 3.0.

**Note!** Unlike the XML interface in API 3.0 the test mode is activated by transferring the test=1 parameter. Please note that the current parameter is also used in the checksum generating, if exists.

To view examples of using the API, please visit the [Bulk SMS Api](http://www.massmailsoftware.com/bulksmsandpager/sms-gateway.php) page on the official website


To use API methods means to send an HTTP-request to the URL like:
[http://atompark.com/api/sms/3.0/METHOD?key=public_key&sum=CONTROL_SUM&arg1=ARG_1&argN=ARG_N](http://atompark.com/api/sms/3.0/METHOD?key=public_key&sum=CONTROL_SUM&arg1=ARG_1&argN=ARG_N)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
